scripts.android: yarn clear && cd android/ && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && adb reverse tcp:9090 tcp:9090 && ENVFILE=.env.development react-native run-android
scripts.ios: yarn clear && ENVFILE=.env.development react-native run-ios --simulator='iPhone SE'
scripts.clear: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-*; rm -rf $TMPDIR/haste-*; rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-*; watchman watch-del-all; yarn cache clean
scripts.clear-modules: rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock && yarn && yarn clear
